tokens.text: returns position delta for an entity

description: Returns the position delta for an entity. Takes one argument that represents the desired axis (0 == x-axis, 1 == y-axis, 2 == z-axis). Applies to player animation.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Position Delta
generated_doNotEdit.description: Returns the position delta for an actor.  Takes one argument that represents the desired axis (0 == x-axis, 1 == y-axis, 2 == z-axis).
